card.name: Emperor Dorrek I
card.property: Retaliate 1. [star] Emperor Dorrek I's attacks gain ranged. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Before you stands Dorrek, emperor to a world whose name no outworlder could ever pronounce, and to a race named Skrull! We are, to put it simply, a proud people! Some might even call us imperious!"

card.name: Emperor Dorrek I
card.property: Retaliate 1. [star] Emperor Dorrek I's attacks gain ranged. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Before you stands Dorrek, emperor to a world whose name no outworlder could ever pronounce, and to a race named Skrull! We are, to put it simply, a proud people! Some might even call us imperious!"

card.name: Emperor Dorrek I
card.property: Retaliate 2. [star] Emperor Dorrek I's attacks gain ranged. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Before you stands Dorrek, emperor to a world whose name no outworlder could ever pronounce, and to a race named Skrull! We are, to put it simply, a proud people! Some might even call us imperious!"

card.name: Emperor Dorrek VII
card.property: Incite 1[per_hero]. [star] Emperor Dorrek VII's attacks gain overkill. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Every single member of your species will die under my rule. And your families will be the first blood I taste."

card.name: Emperor Dorrek VII
card.property: Incite 1[per_hero]. [star] Emperor Dorrek VII's attacks gain overkill. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Every single member of your species will die under my rule. And your families will be the first blood I taste."

"Every single member of your species will die under my rule. And your families will be the first blood I taste."

card.name: Empress R'Klll
card.property: When Revealed: Empress R'Klll attacks each player in hero form. [star] Empress R'Klll's attacks gain piercing. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"I am far more than a mere Skrull! I am R'Klll, empress of Skrulls! Survivor of Galactus! Mother of Anelle, the holy martyr! Grandmother to Dorrek VIII, the king of all space!"

card.name: Empress R'Klll
card.property: When Revealed: Empress R'Klll attacks each player in hero form. [star] Empress R'Klll's attacks gain piercing. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"I am far more than a mere Skrull! I am R'Klll, empress of Skrulls! Survivor of Galactus! Mother of Anelle, the holy martyr! Grandmother to Dorrek VIII, the king of all space!"

card.name: Empress R'Klll
card.property: When Revealed: Empress R'Klll attacks each player in hero form. [star] Empress R'Klll's attacks gain piercing. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"I am far more than a mere Skrull! I am R'Klll, empress of Skrulls! Survivor of Galactus! Mother of Anelle, the holy martyr! Grandmother to Dorrek VIII, the king of all space!"

card.name: Empress S'Byll
card.property: Steady. Toughness. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Everything is subordinate to the triumph of the Skrulls!"

card.name: Empress S'Byll
card.property: Steady. Toughness. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Everything is subordinate to the triumph of the Skrulls!"

card.name: Empress S'Byll
card.property: Stalwart. Toughness. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.
"Everything is subordinate to the triumph of the Skrulls!"

card.name: Rise of the Skrull Empire
card.property: Contents: All villains (I) and (II) (stages (II) and (III) instead for the expert mode). Skrull Empire, Skrull Society and Standard sets. One modular set (Army of Skrulls). Setup: Create the PLANET and the Villain deck (see insert). Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. Put the Skrull Empire environment (I) into play (stage (II) instead for the expert mode).

alternate.name: Rise of the Skrull Empire
alternate.property: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck.
The Skrulls are a breed of green-skinned humanoids from the Andromeda Galaxy. They are a fierce warrior race who carved for themselves the oldest surviving empire in the Universe's history.

card.name: Andromeda Galaxy Colonization
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a Skrull minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
The Andromeda Galaxy is home to a great number of alien species, foremost among them the Skrulls who are usually the dominant force of their galaxy, a galaxy with millions of inhabited worlds.

alternate.name: Andromeda Galaxy Colonization
alternate.property: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck.
The Skrulls have dominated the Andromeda Galaxy for tens of millions of years, though their dominance has fluctuated as their empire has gone through cycles of expansion, decline, and resurgence.

card.name: Further Empire Expansion
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a Skrull minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
The Skrulls have also expanded their dominion by colonizing uninhabited worlds. Within the Andromeda Galaxy, the Skrull have conquered or colonized every suitable world.

alternate.name: Further Empire Expansion
alternate.property: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck.
As time went on, Skrulls were already expanding into neighboring galaxies becoming an intergalactic empire.

card.name: Entire Universe Domination
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a SKRULL minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.
The Skrulls consider it their duty to bring peace to the cosmos by conquering and subjugating every inhabited world in the universe.

alternate.name: Entire Universe Domination
alternate.property: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Skrulls are taught that every world in the cosmos is meant to be a Skrull world. They see it as their destiny.

card.name: Skrull Empire I
card.property: Incite Rebellion - Hero Action: Choose to either exhaust your hero or spend 2 resources of any type → choose 1 PLANET environment in play. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round. (Limit once per round per player.)

card.name: Skrull Empire II
card.property: When Revealed: Shuffle each set-aside Overthrow into the encounter deck. Incite Rebellion - Hero Action: Choose to either exhaust your hero or spend 2 resources of any type → choose 1 PLANET environment in play. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round. (Limit once per round per player.)

card.name: Skrull Empire III
card.property: When Revealed: Shuffle each set-aside Overthrow into the encounter deck. Incite Rebellion - Hero Action: Choose to either exhaust your hero or spend 2 resources of any type → choose 1 PLANET environment in play. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round. (Limit once per round per player.)

card.name: Aks'lo
card.property: Each SKRULL minion gets +2 hit points.
A jewel in the crown of the Skrull Empire. Once the remote world was a wildlife sanctuary. A garden on the edge of spacefor the Skrull empress and her most trusted advisors to enjoy.

card.name: Hy'lt Minor
card.property: Each identity gets -1 REC.
Hy'lt Minor was a planet inhabited by the Skrulls. It was attacked by the Builders who sent an army of Alephs to destroy it.

card.name: Satriani
card.property: Each SKRULL minion gains guard.
The third known world to be the Throneworld of the Skrull Empire. A throneworld under Empress S'Byll and later Queen Veranke.

card.name: Skrell
card.property: Each SKRULL minion gets +1 SCH.
Skrell, a colony world which was founded by Skrull scientists, was mostly ignored by the warlords, who traditionally had little regard for the scientist cast.

card.name: Skrullos
card.property: Each side scheme gains the crisis icon ([crisis icon]).
At first there were three groups of Skrulls on Skrullos, the immortal Eternals rapidly evolving Prime Skrulls and the shapeshifting Deviants.

card.name: Tarnax II
card.property: Decrease the target threat value of the main scheme by 1[per_hero] .
Tarnax II is a world of chameleons, or better said shape-shifters, not bound to one specific shape or purpose of form. A new Skrull civilization was established on this planet.

card.name: Tarnax IV
card.property: While a side scheme is in play, this card gains the amplify icon ([amplify]).
Approximately 100,000 years ago, the Skrulls throneworld was relocated to Tarnax IV. It remained the center of the empire till its destruction at the hands of Galactus.

card.name: Tarnax VII
card.property: Each SKRULL minion gets +1 ATK.
Tarnax VII is another planet, ruled by the Skrull Empire. It contains several military training centers, specializing in the training of Super-Skrulls.

card.name: Zaragz'na
card.property: Each ally and support enters play exhausted.
Zaragz'na was a home to the family of Kl'rt, but years before he became the Super-Skrull. He betrothed a wealthy Skrullian countess ans spawned two children, a son, Sarnogg, and a daughter, Jazinda.

card.name: Impostor
card.property: Treat attached ally as a SKRULL minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When revealed: Attach to the non-SKRULL ally with the most remaining hit points without Impostor attached. Attached ally engages its controller. Otherwise, the villain schemes.

card.name: Intelligentsia
card.property: Each other SKRULL enemy gets +1 SCH. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Intelligentsia would attack, she schemes instead. [acceleration]

card.name: Emperor's Throne
card.property: When Defeated: The villain attacks the player who defeated this scheme (even if that player is in alter-ego form). Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation. [acceleration] [hazard]
"How dare you come here and threaten me in my own home? The Earth planet is ours!" -Emperor Dorrek VII

card.name: Seeking a Suitable World
card.property: Incite 2. [acceleration]
Emperor Dorrek I was the Skrull ruler who began to expand his race's influence by seeking new worlds beyond their own.

card.name: A New Skrull Is Born
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard a SKRULL minion and reveal it.
"The war song of the Skrulls sings inside you. You are the requiem of the shapeless soul!" -Empress S'Byll

card.name: Giving Orders
card.property: When Revealed: Each SKRULL minion activates against the player it is engaged with. If no minion activated this way, this card gains surge.
"Warriors of the Skrull armada! This base now belongs to us!" -Emperor Dorrek VII

card.name: Long Live the Empire
card.property: When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from the villain for each SKRULL enemy in play. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Heal 1 damage from the villain for each SKRULL enemy in play.

card.name: Overthrow
card.property: When Revealed: Remove the current villain from the game and reveal the top card of the villain deck. Then, set Overthrow aside, out of play. [star] Boost: Deal this card to yourself as a facedown encounter card.

card.name: Wrath of the Empire
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck for each PLANET environment in play. Place 1 acceleration token on the main scheme, if a card with the acceleration icon ([acceleration]) was discarded this way. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 boost icon ( [boost] ) for each PLANET environment in play.
